mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_img_file_info(file_nm, file_path, file_size, reg_dt, file_format, download_nm, img_width, img_height ) VALUES( #{file_nm}, #{file_path}, #{file_size}, NOW(), #{file_format}, #{download_nm}, #{img_width}, #{img_height} )
mapper.select: SELECT img_no, CONCAT(file_path, file_nm,'.',file_format) AS file_nm, download_nm, file_size, img_width, img_height, DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS reg_dt FROM tb_img_file_info WHERE img_no = #{img_no}
